TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PartialCachingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PartialCachingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PartialCachingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义 Web 窗体用户控件（.ascx 文件）用于指示是否以及如何缓存其输出的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that Web Forms user controls (.ascx files) use to indicate if and how their output is cached.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性类右键单击用户控件 （.ascx 文件） 的支持片段缓存，并封装 ASP.NET 使用缓存控件时的缓存设置。The attribute class marks user controls (.ascx files) that support fragment caching, and encapsulates the cache settings that ASP.NET uses when caching the control. 页面和控件开发人员使用属性，以便启用输出缓存中的代码隐藏文件的用户控件。Page and controls developers use the attribute to enable output caching for a user control in a code-behind file. 使用可以启用的几种方式之一是输出缓存。Using the is one of several ways you can enable output caching. 以下列表描述可用于启用输出缓存的方法。The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching. - 使用指令来启用输出缓存在声明性方案中。Use the directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用要启用缓存的代码隐藏文件中的用户控件。Use the to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 使用类以编程方式在其中你正在使用的编程方案中指定要缓存设置实例。Use the class to programmatically specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances. 如果用户控件包含一个指令，或具有应用，ASP.NET 分析器会生成的实例类用于包装该用户控件。If a user control contains an directive or has a applied, the ASP.NET parser generates an instance of the class to wrap the user control. 有关 ASP.NET 缓存的详细信息，请参阅[Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce)。For more information about ASP.NET caching, see [Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce). 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用。The following code example demonstrates using the . 此示例具有三个部分：This example has three parts: - 分部类中， `ctlMine`，该类继承自基本类并向其应用特性。A partial class, `ctlMine`, that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. - 用户控件，用于为`ctlMine`分部类。A user control that is used with the `ctlMine` partial class. - Web 窗体页承载用户控件。A Web Forms page that hosts the user control. 该示例的第一部分演示的分部类的继承自基本类并向其应用特性。The first part of the example demonstrates a partial class that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. 在此示例中，该属性指定应 20 秒缓存用户控件。In this example, the attribute specifies that the user control should be cached for 20 seconds. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx.vb#1)] 该示例的第二部分显示使用与前面的示例来演示用户控制缓存的用户控件。The second part of the example shows a user control that is used with the previous example to demonstrate user control caching. [!code-aspx-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx#5)] 该示例的第三个部分演示承载用户控件的 Web 窗体页。The third part of the example demonstrates a Web Forms page that hosts the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.aspx#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 duration) cil managed

param.name: duration
param.span: 用户控件应保留在输出缓存中的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, a user control should remain in the output cache.

summary.span: 使用分配给要缓存的用户控件的指定持续时间初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified duration assigned to the user control to be cached.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造函数可以应用到用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在示例中，以指示可以缓存用户控件并指定缓存持续时间使用的构造函数。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached and to specify the caching duration. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public PartialCachingAttribute (int duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom) cil managed
Public Sub New (duration As Integer, varyByParams As String, varyByControls As String, varyByCustom As String)
public: PartialCachingAttribute(int duration, System::String ^ varyByParams, System::String ^ varyByControls, System::String ^ varyByCustom);

param.name: duration
param.span: 用户控件缓存的时间（以秒计）。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, that the user control is cached.

param.name: varyByParams
param.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于使输出缓存发生变化。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.

param.span: 默认情况下，这些字符串对应于使用 GET 方法特性发送的查询字符串值，或对应于使用 POST 方法发送的参数。

span.span: By default, these strings correspond to a query string value sent with GET method attributes or to a parameter sent using the POST method.

param.span: 如果将该特性设置为多个参数，则输出缓存将为每个指定的参数包含所请求的文档的不同版本。

span.span: When this attribute is set to multiple parameters, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified parameter.

param.span: 可能的值包括“none”、“\*”以及任何有效的查询字符串或 POST 参数名。

span.span: Possible values include "none", "\*", and any valid query string or POST parameter name.

param.name: varyByControls
param.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于使输出缓存发生变化。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.

param.span: 这些字符串表示用户控件上属性的完全限定名。

span.span: These strings represent fully qualified names of properties on a user control.

param.span: 此参数用于用户控件时，用户控件输出随每个指定的用户控件属性的缓存而变化。

span.span: When this parameter is used for a user control, the user control output is varied to the cache for each specified user control property.

param.name: varyByCustom
param.span: 任何表示自定义输出缓存要求的文本。

span.span: Any text that represents custom output caching requirements.

param.span: 如果赋予此参数一个值“browser”，则缓存随浏览器名称和主版本信息而变化。

span.span: If this parameter is given a value of "browser", the cache is varied by browser name and major version information.

param.span: 如果输入了自定义字符串，则必须在应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中重写 方法。

span.span: If a custom string is entered, you must override the method in your application's Global.asax file.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，用于指定缓存持续时间、任何 GET 和 POST 值、控件名和用于改变缓存的自定义输出缓存要求。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the caching duration, any GET and POST values, control names, and custom output caching requirements used to vary the cache.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造函数可以应用到用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在示例中，构造函数用于指示可以缓存用户控件，指定缓存持续时间为 20 秒，并指定一个名为控件`state`的各种用户控制输出。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached, specify the caching duration as 20 seconds, and specify a control named `state` for which the user control output will be varied. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/CS/partialcache_1cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/VB/partialcache_1vb.ascx.vb#2)]

span.span: These database names match those SQL Server cache dependencies identified in your Web configuration section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Duration { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取缓存项应保留在输出缓存中的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets the amount of time, in seconds, that cached items should remain in the output cache.

value.span: 用户控件应保留在输出缓存中的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, a user control should remain in the output cache.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造函数可以应用到用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 该属性指示用户控件可以缓存，并指定缓存持续时间为 20 秒。The attribute indicates that the user control can be cached and specifies a 20 second caching duration. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置提供程序的名称，该提供程序用于存储关联控件的输出缓存数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the provider that is used to store the output-cached data for the associated control.
The name of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以声明方式或通过使用属性，可以设置此属性。You can set this property declaratively or by using an attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shared { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户控件输出是否可在多页间共享。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether user control output can be shared with multiple pages.

value.span: 如果用户控件输出可以在多页间共享，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if user control output can be shared between multiple pages; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为`true`后，缓存可以由多个 Web 窗体页访问用户控制输出。If you set this property to `true`, cached user control output can be accessed by multiple Web Forms pages. 如果你未设置为`true`，默认行为是缓存的每个页面，其中包含该用户控件的用户控件输出的一个版本。If you do not set it to `true`, the default behavior is to cache one version of user control output for each page that contains that user control. 通过启用此属性，可能可以节省大量的内存。You can potentially save a significant amount of memory by enabling this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlDependency { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取一个分隔字符串，该字符串标识用户控件所依赖的一个或多个数据库和表的名称对。

span.span: Gets a delimited string that identifies one or more database and table name pairs that the cached user control is dependent on.

value.span: 一个分隔字符串，标识用户控件缓存条目所依赖的一组数据库和表的名称。

span.span: A delimited string that identifies a set of database and table names that the user control cache entry is dependent on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串标识数据库和表名称，根据你的配置中的 SQL Server 缓存依赖项的名称 (通常使用添加`sqlcachedependency`配置元素)。The string identifies databases and table names according to the name of a SQL Server cache dependency in your configuration (typically added using the `sqlcachedependency` configuration elements). 如果你使用 SQL Server 2005，则可以设置"CommandNotification"，指示 ASP.NET 就可以创建用于在当前的 ASP.NET 页的上下文中发出的所有 SQL 命令的行级别依赖项属性。If you use SQL Server 2005, you can set the property to "CommandNotification", which instructs ASP.NET to create row level dependencies for all SQL commands issued within the context of the current ASP.NET page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByControls { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取输出缓存用于使用户控件发生变化的用户控件属性列表。

span.span: Gets a list of user control properties that the output cache uses to vary the user control.
The list of user control properties.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造函数可以应用到用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在示例中，以指示可以缓存用户控件、 指定缓存持续时间为 20 秒，以及指定一个名为控件使用的构造函数`state`的各种用户控制输出。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached, to specify the caching duration as 20 seconds, and to specify a control named `state` for which the user control output will be varied. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/CS/partialcache_1cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/VB/partialcache_1vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByCustom { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取输出缓存将用于改变用户控件的自定义字符串列表。

span.span: Gets a list of custom strings that the output cache will use to vary the user control.
The list of custom strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定此属性的"浏览器"，则用户控件将不同浏览器类型和主版本号。If you specify "browser" for this property, the user control will be varied by browser type and major version number. 你还可以使用此属性来扩展输出缓存而改变用户控件响应的值。You can also use this property to extend the values that output cache varies the user control response. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造函数可以应用到用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在示例中，以指示可以缓存用户控件并指定缓存条目所依赖的浏览器类型和主要版本号使用的构造函数。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached and to specify that the cache entry is dependent on the browser type and major version number. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_4/CS/partialcache_3cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_4/VB/partialcache_3vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByParams { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取输出缓存将用于改变用户控件的查询字符串或窗体 参数的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of query string or form parameters that the output cache will use to vary the user control.

value.span: 查询字符串或窗体 参数的列表。

span.span: The list of query string or form parameters.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造函数可以应用到用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在示例中，以指示可以缓存用户控件并指定缓存条目所依赖的参数使用的构造函数。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached and to specify the parameter upon which the cache entry is dependent. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_3#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_3/CS/partialcache_2cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_3#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_3/VB/partialcache_2vb.ascx.vb#2)]
